summary: Ecosystem explores innovative approaches to designing and grooming non-natural ecosystems through interdisciplinary practices that blend philosophy, arts, coding, and more. It emphasizes decentralized and regenerative design to create healthier and more vibrant ecosystems, addressing contemporary challenges through practical methods.
excerpt: Ecosystem Architecture blends diverse fields to design and groom non-natural ecosystems, incorporating decentralization and regenerative design for healthier, vibrant systems.
